text: Brrdā p̄hū̂ thī̀ t̄hūk k̄hạb lị̀xxk cāk b̂ānreụ̄xn k̄hxng phwk k̄heā doy prāṣ̄cāk khwām yutiṭhrrm nxkcāk phwk k̄heā kl̀āw ẁā xạllxḥˌ khụ̄x phracêā k̄hxng reā thèānận læa h̄ā kẁā xạllxḥˌ thrng k̄hạdk̄hwāng mi h̄ı̂ mnus̄ʹy̒ t̀xs̄ū̂ sụ̀ng kạnlæakạn læ̂w brrdā h̄x s̄wd læa bos̄t̄h̒ (k̄hxng phwk khris̄t̒) læa s̄t̄hān thī̀ s̄wd (k̄hxng phwk yiw) læa mạs̄yid thậngh̄lāy thī̀ phranām k̄hx ngxạllxḥˌ t̄hūk kl̀āw rảlụk xỳāng mākmāy t̂xng t̄hūk thảlāy xỳāng næ̀nxn læa næ̀ nx nxạllxḥˌ ca thrng ch̀wyh̄elụ̄x p̄hū̂ thī̀ s̄nạbs̄nun ṣ̄ās̄nā k̄hxng phraxngkh̒ thæ̂ cring xạllxḥˌ pĕn p̄hū̂thrng phlạng p̄hū̂thrng dechānup̣hāph xỳāng thæ̂cring
